biotools.summary: Provides analysis of the hierarchy of protein domain structures. It detects closed loops and van der Waals locks, and outputs domain decomposition at different levels of protein domain structure hierarchy.

bioschemas.name: DHcL
bioschemas.summary: Provides analysis of the hierarchy of protein domain structures. It detects closed loops and van der Waals locks, and outputs domain decomposition at different levels of protein domain structure hierarchy.
